content: get ready for summer with this cute crochet whale shark bag pattern this bag is perfect for holding phones wallets and other small items **materials** ▢country blue yarn from red heart ▢white yarn from red heart ▢yellow yarn from red heart ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle ▢1 inch safety eyes/buttons **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease
